Posts.Content: I been taking tomaxofin for almost a week now.. first they wanted to to chemo to shrink the tumor than lumpectomy and then radiation.. but I had some nodes tested by my collar bone for estrogen receptor .. so My treatment changed for  now to just hormontherapy   ..to stop them growin..
